About the deal

Vgulp presents “unwind at a resort:, at the Chairman’s Jade Resort, near airport, Devanahalli. Offering you an option of two deals, you could choose either.

Deal Option 1:

Get a beer bucket - 5 pints of beer at just 550 + 10.19% taxes, and unlimited usage of water slide and swimming pool

Deal Option 2:

Unlimited Indian Liquor / Beer for 2 hours between (11 AM to 7 PM); Get a choice of one veg starter & one non veg starter, unlimited usage of swimming pool and waterslide at just 999 + 10.19% taxes

If you are looking to have a chill time with family / friends, away from the city, and make a day memorable, we recommend this offer for you.

In deal option 2, unlimited liquor offer is capped at the maximum time of 2 hours, you can have starters and buffet for any time you want. Get off the turf, Take a break from Bangalore, and unwind with Vgulp.

Fine Print
